data.name: Battle vs. Chess - Dark Desert DLC
data.detailed_description:
Dark Desert Map and RuneRunner Mode

Again the armies of the Kings meet! Between the dusty graves of long forgotten giants and the burning sands the battle rages in the Dark Desert. Lead your men to victory.

Beside a total new battlefield the DLC contains a new Battleground-Mode called "Rune Runner". Bomb your way to victory and let your enemies run into your explosive traps, while defending your positions. Attack and defense it's all in your hands! The Rune Runner mode can be played on all battlefields including the Floating Island environment which is part of the second Battle vs. Chess DLC - Floating Island!

Bomb your way to victory and let your enemies run into your explosive traps, while defending your positions. Attack and defense it's all in your hands! The Rune Runner mode can be played on all battlefields including the Floating Island environment which is part of the second Battle vs. Chess DLC - Floating Island!
data.short_description: Again the armies of the Kings meet! Beside the total new battlefield Dark Desert the DLC contains a new Battleground-Mode called "Rune Runner". Bomb your way to victory and let your enemies run into your explosive traps, while defending your positions.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Russian*, Polish, Hungarian, Czech
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor:2.0 GHz Single Core CPU
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Graphics card with Shader 3.0 support and 128 MB RAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:1 GB HD space
  • Sound:Soundcard with 5.1 Support
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64x2
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Graphics card with Shader 3.0 support and 256 MB RAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Sound:Soundcard with 5.1 Support
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:macOS Sierra
  • Processor:Intel Mac 2.GHz
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:Per Pixel Shader 2.0
  • Hard Drive:1 GB HD space
  • Sound:Soundcard with 5.1 Support
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:macOS Sierra
  • Processor:Multicore CPU
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:ATI/AMD Radeon X
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Sound:Soundcard with 5.1 Support
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Ubuntu 16.04 LTS or SteamOS
  • Processor:Intel or AMD Single Core CPU
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Graphics card with Shader 3.0 support and 128 MB RAM
  • Hard Drive:1 GB HD space
  • Sound:Soundcard with 5.1 Support
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Ubuntu 16.04 LTS or SteamOS
  • Processor:Intel or AMD Multi-Core CPU with 2.0 GHz
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Graphics card with Shader 3.0 support and 256 MB RAM
  • Hard Drive:1 GB HD space
  • Sound:Soundcard with 5.1 Support
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
